resources.string: Here, in addition to the role "Administrator", you can authorize additional roles for access to the "Preferences" module.
The module can be completely deactivated via this setting (default: deactivated).

If the "Auto-reply mail" module is activated, the following e-mail will be sent to the new member for each incoming membership declaration. The following variables are replaced: #user_first_name#, #user_last_name#, #organization_name# and #organization_shortname#.
For an "Auto-reply mail" both the sending address ("Sender email" and/or "Email Administrator") and the receiving address (email of the newly registered member) must be available.
Delete only data of the current organization.
- When you delete the data, an error has occurred.\n
- The created data has been cleared.\n
\nTo completely remove the plugin the program files and the menu entry must be removed.
- The table "adm_plugin_preferences" could not be deleted because it houses more data from other plugins.\n
By uninstalling, entries created by the plugin can be deleted in the database.
Select the uninstall scope:\n\n***Attention: This routine deletes only the entries in the Admidio database. Program files and the link in the menu will not be deleted! ***

Here, the profile fields displayed in the membership declaration can be defined. In addition, it is possible to define an introductory and a final text for the entire form. Further info texts can be defined in the menu item "Mandatory fields and info texts".
In kiosk mode, there is no query to exit the plug-in. The declaration of membership is called up again with empty data.
The ONLINE - Declaration of Membership plugin
For this organization, the membership declaration will be made.

The following parameters are possible for all introductory and final texts:

Link: ##URL (e.g. https://...)#Text##

Boldface on: $$
Boldface off: %%
\New line: §§
Here the displayed profile fields can be marked as mandatory fields. These fields must be filled in the declaration of membership. In addition, it is possible to define information texts.

Your data has been saved.

After processing and takeover, you will be notified by e-mail.

Choose:

Yes - The online declaration of membership should be closed
No - Do not finish the online declaration of membership, but enter the data of another member.
